main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Efland, North Carolina, on October 31, 1965, involving a disc-like object that changed colors and moved slowly across the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as triangular in shape and illuminated in red color,It was estimated to be approximately 50 feet in diameter and observed from a distance of about 8:30 p.m.,Several individuals in the area reported seeing the object as well,The object maintained a steady pace, moving left and right without climbing or descending,No sound or exhaust flame was observed during the sighting.
witness description: Individuals in the area, including Miss Sara Hunt, who reported the sighting and had a camera set up to capture it.
